# DeepStream-API


## Data Structure


### NvBufSurface

Holds information about batched buffers.

### NvBufSurfaceParams Struct

Holds information about a single buffer in a batch.



### NvDsBatchMeta


### NvDsFrameMeta


### NvDsMetaList


### NvDsObjectMeta


### NvDsClassifierMeta


### NvDsLabelInfoList


### NvDsLabelInfo


### NvDsUserMeta

### NvDsMetaType
